body.p: Pray send me, in the course of the day, if possible, twelve copies of the Pictures from Italy.Pictures from Italy was first published in the Daily News between 21 January and 11 March 1846, then as a single volume in May 1846, with illustrations by Samuel Palmer. Bradbury & Evans's Accounts show that CD was sent 25 copies in total; see To Felix Joyce, 19 May 1846, in Pilgrim Letters 4, p. 547.
